duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide human resources guidelines and align human resource solutions to meet current and long-term business requirements.
Work closely with business leaders to develop succession plans for key talents and key job positions while aligning with company policy and business needs.
Provide performance management guidance and provoke positive changes in people management in partnership with business leadership.
Partner with management to communicate and implement various human resources policies, procedures, standards, and government laws/regulations.
Identify training and individual coaching needs in designated business units.
Work with business and company leadership to resolve complex employee relations issues and to conduct practical, thorough, and objective investigations.
Attract and retain talent in partnership with site leadership.
Onboard, offboard, and provide ongoing communication around engagement.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in human resources or related field, or a High School Diploma/GED, plus four (4) years of relevant experience and appropriate certifications may be substituted for meeting the educational requirements only.
